intro: After three years of experience in web solutions development in real estate branch, followed by two years in website creation in a web agency, here I am in a whole new journey: freelancing.

consulting.title: Skills to guide you on a good way
consulting.text: User experience is the key of a succeeding web solution. The secret? Smooth and clear navigation. To this end, well optimized code and best suited tools are the main ingredients.

typology.title: A project that fits to your needs
typology.text: How to best design a project might seem complicated sometimes. I am here to help you making strategic choices for your project, in order to find a solution that fulfils your ambitions.

contact.title: Would like to get to know more or talk about your project?
